channel.title: [mopar get on irc]Pokemon Demo
channel.description:
this is the first demo of my pokemon game, theres not much now as i've disabled wild pokemon encounters until i finish the battling
you can play at: http://legecon.com/poke/ register an account, then click launch and play :P
ps: thx mopar 4 hosting servr also, its not going to work for now, cause mopar is bein a cunt and not coming online so i can tell him to change the servr :$ [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] Just out of order. You're a bit of an ungrateful shit really[/center]

item.title: [mopar get on irc]Pokemon Demo
item.dc:creator: @MybBob MybBob
item.description:
@MybBob wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:30, topic:91616”][quote author=lothy link=topic=133412.msg1298885#msg1298885 date=1178919280]

So let me get this straight, we can’t call people cunt’s yet you do what you want…?

It’s very hard to tell the difference between a serious remark and a joke when the only thing presented to you is text.
[/quote]

And also when it’s something only people from the IRC would understand. Rules are rules though. Plus he was already moderated.

I don’t know if others agree with me, but I think this forum always has room for lawl. Even though he may spam, flame, etc I’ve always found him extremely funny. He’s obviously very smart, just extremely laid back and erm… I don’t know the word I am looking for That being said, if everyone on this forum was like lawl it would be a disaster but I think there’s always room for one <3 I wouldn’t want to see him banned.

If anyone remembers p00flake, he was this really funny wigger kid that everyone hated. But it would have sucked to see him leave because there goes half of the humor on kaitnieks forums :P[/quote]

I am from IRC you noob, no more free secks for you

</3u from Bob_Lablah

Read full topic

item.title: [mopar get on irc]Pokemon Demo
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

well, Now since I got java to work in Firefox, it has the same results that I had in Internet Explorer, It says updating cache and then restarts after 2 minutes.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 11, 2007, 07:07:20 AM[/size][hr]nvm, i made another account called “cookie” for testing, it works,and there are a lot of people, but Could you turn up the frame rate, and have a 2nd password field so people can’t get their pass wrong the first time? Also please delete the account: kloplop321 please, the password doesn’t work for me and I am on a laptop, and my hands don’t like the keyboard so I may have typed my pass wrong.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 11, 2007, 07:32:26 AM[/size][hr]ohh and another thing, can you make a account timeout thing so if they are not active in 1 minute the log off, because it says cookie is still logged in, but this is so far going to be a great addition to the online community, Lawl.

Read full topic
